data.name: Balagha
data.description: The study of the effective use of language, including the use of metaphors, similes, and other figures of speech.

data.name: Khataba
data.description: The study of public speaking and effective delivery of speeches, including the use of tone, rhythm, and other techniques to engage an audience.

data.name: Bayan
data.description: The study of how language can be used to convey meaning and express ideas, particularly in a persuasive or influential context.

data.name: I'jaz
data.description: The study of the unique features of the Quranic Arabic language and the ways in which it is considered to be unparalleled in its eloquence and effectiveness.

data.name: Adab
data.description: The study of Arabic literature and the use of language in literary contexts, including the study of poetry, prose, and other literary forms.

data.name: Munazara
data.description: The study of argumentation and debate in the Arabic language, including the use of logic, evidence, and rhetorical techniques to persuade an audience.

data.name: Hadith
data.description: The study of the prophetic tradition and the use of language in the context of Islamic teachings and practices, including the study of the sayings and actions of the Prophet Muhammad.
